title: Belgium
description:
Belgium regional formations with map interface.

20 columns

Compiled by Jane Block in coordination with Belgium Stratigraphic Commission (Noel Vandenberghe, Hance Luc, et al.).

Main sources for lithology descriptions and age calibrations are chapters in:

Bultynck, P., and Dejonghe, L., (editors), 2001. Guide to a Revised Lithostratigraphic Scale of Belgium, Geologica Belgica, volume 4. (2) Dejonghe, L. (editor), 2006. Current Status of Chronostratigraphic Units Named from Belgium and Adjacent Areas. Geologica Belgica, volume 9
